com.aldebaran.qi.helper.proxies
Class ALNavigation

java.lang.Object
  com.aldebaran.qi.helper.ALProxy
      com.aldebaran.qi.helper.proxies.ALNavigation

public class ALNavigation
extends ALProxy

Use ALNavigation module to make the robot go safely to the asked pose2D.

See Also:
NAOqi APIs for ALNavigation

wait

public java.lang.Boolean wait(java.lang.Integer id,
                              java.lang.Integer timeoutPeriod)
                       throws com.aldebaran.qi.CallError,
                              java.lang.InterruptedException
Wait for the end of a long running method that was called using 'post'

Parameters:
id - The ID of the method that was returned when calling the method using 'post'
timeoutPeriod - The timeout period in ms. To wait indefinately, use a timeoutPeriod of zero.
Returns:
True if the timeout period terminated. False if the method returned.
Throws:
com.aldebaran.qi.CallError

navigateTo

public java.lang.Boolean navigateTo(java.lang.Float x,
                                    java.lang.Float y)
                             throws com.aldebaran.qi.CallError,
                                    java.lang.InterruptedException
Makes the robot navigate to a relative metrical target pose2D expressed in FRAME_ROBOT. The robot computes a path to avoid obstacles.

Parameters:
x - The position along x axis [m].
y - The position along y axis [m].
Throws:
com.aldebaran.qi.CallError
java.lang.InterruptedException

navigateTo

                                    java.lang.Float y,
                                    java.lang.Object config)
                             throws com.aldebaran.qi.CallError,
                                    java.lang.InterruptedException
Makes the robot navigate to a relative metrical target pose2D expressed in FRAME_ROBOT. The robot computes a path to avoid obstacles.

Parameters:
x - The position along x axis [m].
y - The position along y axis [m].
config - Configuration ALValue. For example, [["SpeedFactor", 0.5]] sets speedFactor to 0.5
Throws:
com.aldebaran.qi.CallError
java.lang.InterruptedException
